backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, locations, and OTP entries with access control and CRUD-style update/query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence manifest listing implemented frontend features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode variants, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application router setup with protected routes, root layout, and pages for login, role selection, dashboards, and registration.
frontend/src/components/AppBackButton.ts: Reusable back button using safe navigation logic with a configurable UI variant.
frontend/src/components/LocationStatusCa: UI card showing geolocation permission state, errors, coordinates, and actions to request or refresh location.
frontend/src/components/MobileAppShell.t: Provides mobile layout with header, logout, main content, and conditional bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/OtpLoginCard.tsx: Implements phone-based OTP login flow with request, resend, verify, error handling, and demo OTP copy support.
frontend/src/components/ShopOpenClosedTo: Renders two-button toggle for marking a shop as open or closed.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
Provides controlled back navigation with fallback routes based on authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication lifecycle, exposing identity, login, logout, and status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocationPermission: Handles geolocation permission state, fetching coordinates, and classifying location errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useOtpChallenge.ts: Exposes mutations to request and verify OTP codes through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOtpSession.ts: Stores and manages OTP verification state and phone number in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistLastKnownLo: Persists authenticated user's last known coordinates to backend when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to get and update the caller’s user profile and last known location using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useShop.ts: Defines hooks for fetching, registering, and updating the caller’s shop, tied to Internet Identity and backend actor actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, scrollbars, and mobile-friendly UI behaviors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global styles.
UI page showing customer home feed with location card, search UI, categories, and placeholders for nearby shops.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login, OTP verification flow, and redirects authenticated users to role selection.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectionPage.tsx: Allows users to choose a role, saves their profile, and redirects based on role or existing profile state.
frontend/src/pages/ShopDashboardPage.tsx: Displays shop dashboard where owners can register/edit shops, post updates, and toggle shop open status.
React page for creating or editing a shop, handling form inputs, image upload/preview, validation, and submission using shop and location hooks.
frontend/src/utils/phoneNumber.ts: Utility functions to validate, normalize, and format Indian phone numbers to E.164 format (+91).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for the app theme.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing LocalBuzz app state, requirements, architecture notes, and known issues.
